mapper.select: SELECT * FROM est_opt_list_tb ORDER BY est_opt_num ASC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{startRow}

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN point_source IN ('충전', '출석') THEN point_pt ELSE 0 END) AS point_deposit, SUM(CASE WHEN point_source IN ('경매', '결제', '소멸') THEN point_pt ELSE 0 END) AS point_withdraw, SUM(CASE WHEN point_source = '충전' THEN point_pt ELSE 0 END) AS recharge_point, SUM(CASE WHEN point_source = '출석' THEN point_pt ELSE 0 END) AS attend_point, SUM(CASE WHEN point_source = '소멸' THEN point_pt ELSE 0 END) AS expired_point, SUM(CASE WHEN point_source = '결제' THEN point_pt ELSE 0 END) AS pay_point, SUM(CASE WHEN point_source = '경매' THEN point_pt ELSE 0 END) AS auct_point, -- point_deposit에서 point_withdraw를 차감한 값 SUM(CASE WHEN point_source IN ('충전', '출석') THEN point_pt ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN point_source IN ('경매', '결제', '소멸') THEN point_pt ELSE 0 END) AS remain_point, -- 판매율 : recharge_point / (recharge_point + attend_point), 0으로 나누는 경우 CASE WHEN (SUM(CASE WHEN point_source = '충전' THEN point_pt ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN point_source = '출석' THEN point_pt ELSE 0 END)) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN point_source = '충전' THEN point_pt ELSE 0 END)*100 / (SUM(CASE WHEN point_source = '충전' THEN point_pt ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN point_source = '출석' THEN point_pt ELSE 0 END)) END AS sales_rate FROM point WHERE point_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{sdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{fdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT TO_CHAR(est_tra_com_date, 'YYYY-MM') AS month, ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN est_tra_type = '매매' THEN est_tra_cond ELSE NULL END)) AS sale_price, COUNT(CASE WHEN est_tra_type = '매매' THEN 1 END) AS sale_count, ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN est_tra_type = '전세' THEN est_tra_cond ELSE NULL END)) AS whole_rent_price, COUNT(CASE WHEN est_tra_type = '전세' THEN 1 END) AS whole_rent_count, ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN est_tra_type = '월세' THEN est_monthpay ELSE NULL END)) AS monthly_rent_price, COUNT(CASE WHEN est_tra_type = '월세' THEN 1 END) AS monthly_rent_count FROM estate_tb WHERE TO_CHAR(est_tra_com_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= '2024-01-01' GROUP BY TO_CHAR(est_tra_com_date, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(est_tra_com_date, 'YYYY-MM')
